author: cnbc.com
title: Astreya Names Tom Miller Chief Marketing Officer
text:
SANTA CLARA, Calif., Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Astreya announces the appointment of Tom Miller as Chief Marketing Officer effective immediately. Tom joins Astreya at an extremely exciting time, amidst a period of expansion for the company. 2017 was a year for exceptional growth for Astreya, and with global managed services projected to grow over 60% by 2022, it's a crucial time for us to exploit these opportunities.
Tom has had 25 years of experience leading transformational marketing teams. He previously was Vice President of National Marketing at Gannett, where he was responsible for all strategic marketing for USA TODAY, USA TODAY Network and Gannett national brands. Prior to Gannett, he served as Director of Sales Strategy, AOL Media Network, responsible for the strategic development and execution of digitally based, B2B marketing programs. He also held executive marketing roles at 9Lenses, Havas, White & Partners, and Source Media.
"We are delighted to bring someone on board with Tom's depth of experience and understanding with transformative companies. Tom's impressive leadership track record, and business acumen are going to be invaluable to our company, both strategically and operationally," stated Edwin Miller, CEO of Astreya.
In this role as global CMO, Mr. Miller will serve as Astreya's senior expert in marketing. Mr. Miller will lead brand marketing and strategy efforts that will include product marketing, acquisition and retention.
ABOUT ASTREYA
Astreya is a premier IT solutions provider, offering strategic and tactical services for some of the world's most recognizable and innovative organizations. Astreya was founded in 2001 as a staffing company and value-added re-seller. The company quickly grew to include 24/7 end-user compute support, program management, network management and data center operations. Demand for Astreya's expertise increased, which led the evolution from staffing to Astreya Managed Services and the formation of Astreya Professional Services. Headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley, Astreya is committed to delivering technology enabled services to fuel digital transformation. Astreya employs over 800 IT professionals in more than 35 countries. For more information, visit the company's website at www.astreya.com .
